content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the taurage district court the applicant asked the defendant to pay for the expenses of the legal process the court has made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the court has dissolved the marriage and granted ownership of a plot of land and a building to the applicant the applicant has been ordered to pay the defendant compensation for their share of the marital property the text discusses three articles from the civil code related to matrimonial property the applicant filed for the dissolution of their marriage due to the defendants fault the court allowed the action to proceed and will decide on the division of community property and liabilities the court granted the full action to dissolve the marriage and ordered the division of matrimonial property awarding certain assets to the applicant and ordering them to pay compensation to the defendant
